title: Remco Evenepoel rages at missed opportunity at Vuelta a España: ‘I didn’t know we were sprinting for the win’
content:
Defending champ left fuming after crowd noise blocks radio comms that would have clarified racing situation.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel rages at missed opportunity at Vuelta a España: ‘I didn’t know we were sprinting for the win’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
